name: A'Hote C++ Color Library
short_description: Note: The color functionality in A'Hote has been merged into the Papyrus library. A'Hote is a C++ library for creating color schemes including complements, split complements, triadics, tetradics, analogous colors, monochromatic groups, et. al.
